title: How to Respond to Leads Instantly with Templates
description: Set up instant auto-replies so leads hear from you in seconds, not hours.
requirements: Access to your business phone or messaging app
5 minutes to write a quick response template

steps.title: Write your instant response template
steps.description: Create a friendly message that goes out immediately when someone contacts you.
substeps: Ask: 'Write a friendly auto-reply for a [your trade] business. Keep it short, confirm we got their message, and say we'll call back within 1 hour.'
Copy the response and tweak it to sound like you
steps.tip: Example: 'Thanks for reaching out to [Business Name]! Got your message and I'll call you back within the hour. - Mike'

steps.title: Set up text auto-reply (iPhone)
substeps: Go to Settings → Focus → Do Not Disturb
Turn on 'Auto-Reply' and paste your message
Note: This only works when Do Not Disturb is on
steps.tip: For always-on auto-reply, you'll need an app like OpenPhone or a CRM.

steps.title: Set up text auto-reply (Android)
substeps: Search 'SMS Auto Reply' in the Play Store
Create a new rule for 'All incoming messages'
Paste your template and turn it on

steps.title: Set up email auto-reply
steps.description: Auto-respond to emails from your website or contact form.
substeps: In Gmail: Settings → See all settings → Vacation responder
Turn it on and paste your message
For better results, use your website form's built-in auto-reply

steps.title: Test it yourself
substeps: Text your business number from a different phone
Check that the auto-reply comes through

successMessage: Now every lead gets an instant response! They know you're alive and will call back soon.
proTips: The goal is speed, not perfection. A fast 'got it!' beats a slow detailed response
Consider OpenPhone ($15/mo) for a dedicated business line with better auto-reply features
Still call them back ASAP — auto-reply buys you time, not infinite patience
